hero.title: I'm Tricia
hero.subtitle: Ready to partner with you on your path to healing after a breakup and moving on with your life!
hero.description: Taking you from the pain of the past to the amazing future wating for you.

user_pain_points.tittle: You've just had the rug pulled out from under you, right? You want to move on but not sure how best to do so?
user_pain_points.subtitle: Let me guess, right now you're...
pain_points: Struggling with overwhelming emotions and the isolation that often accompanies them.
Feeling you've lost a core part of your identity and purpose.
Trying to figure out how to rebuild a life that feels whole and fulfilling.

testimonials.quote: Tricia is a compassionate and skilled therapist who has helped me navigate the emotional rollercoaster of grief and loss. She has a gift for helping people reconnect with their sense of self and purpose, and create a life that feels whole and fulfilling.
testimonials.author: Jane Doe

testimonials.quote: Tricia is a compassionate and skilled therapist who has helped me navigate the emotional rollercoaster of grief and loss. She has a gift for helping people reconnect with their sense of self and purpose, and create a life that feels whole and fulfilling.
testimonials.author: Jane Doe

benefits.title: I've been there and know how to help you move forward...
benefits: Together we’ll tackle those intense emotions like anger,sadness and fear, so you can process them in a way that brings you clarity and peace of mind.
Heal the old patterns that kept you in toxic relationships and break free ready to create healthier, happier connections.
Move beyond feeling stuck or defeated, finding renewed confidence and feeling empowered to create a fresh vision for your future.

coaching_info.title: Coaching Info
coaching_info.subtitle: Breakups, separations, and divorces can be some of life’s most challenging moments, but they also hold the potential for profound transformation.
coaching_info.description: My Conscious Uncoupling coaching program is built around a proven 5-step process designed to help you heal your heart, reclaim your personal power, and create a brighter, more fulfilling future. This journey is about more than just moving on—it’s about moving forward with intention, healing, and hope. Together, we’ll transform your pain into power and uncover the limitless potential that awaits on the other side of heartbreak.

hero.title: The roadmap for turning the pain of your breakup into an opportunity to recreate your life.

description.title: Finding Emotional Freedom
description.description: Find the emotional space to move beyond the old painful patterns in love and use this shattering to radically evolve how you live and how you love.

description.title: Reclaim Your Power And Your Life
description.description: Let go of being a wounded victim of love shifting your perspective away from blame to taking full responsibility for your part in what happened.

description.title: Break The Pattern
description.description: Finally understand and break free of the painful experiences that have been at the heart of the repetitive patterns in your relationships and give yourself the opportunity to evolve beyond them.

description.title: Become A Love Alchemist
description.description: Begin to make choices and take actions that graduate you from the painful patterns of the past. Radically transform the dynamics between you and your former partner allowing for the possible emergence of a healthy new form the relationship has the potential to take.

description.title: Create Your Happily Even After Life
description.description: Get the support you will need to make wise, healthy and life-affirming decisions as you take on the essential  tasks of reinventing your life.  Set up the vital new structures that will ensure that the new life you’re embracing will be greater than the one you are letting go of.

hero.title: let's chat
hero.subtitle: Ready to chat about your business? I'd love to get to know you and your needs!
hero.description: I'm here to help take you to that next level you've been dreaming about!

hero.title: Lets get Personal
hero.description: Are you ready to make a shift? Its time to dream big.

first.title: Hey there, I'm Tricia.
first.content: A certified Conscious Uncoupling and Relationship Coach, trained and personally mentored by Katherine Woodward Thomas, the New York Times bestselling author of Conscious Uncoupling: 5 Steps to Live Happily Even After. My mission is to uplift and inspire women as they navigate the often-devastating process of ending a significant relationship. Having been through this challenging path myself, I'm here to help others channel heartbreak into a powerful opportunity for growth, supporting them in creating fulfilling lives for themselves and brighter futures for their families. From Long Island, New York, I work globally, connecting with clients from all walks of life who are ready to rebuild with intention and hope.

second.title: Where I started
second.description: Sartorial Succulents Butcher Fanny Pack Church-Key Tote Bag Bushwick Jean Shorts.
second.content: Before becoming a coach, I spent years as a professional chef, dedicated to making beautiful food and to creating warmth and connection around the table. Today, I bring that same sense of warmth and nourishment into my coaching, fostering an environment where my clients feel seen, supported, and encouraged to reach for a better, more fulfilling life. Just as a recipe can be transformed with care and the right ingredients, I believe that every woman has the potential to transform her life after loss and to rediscover her own strength, joy, and purpose.

fun-facts.title: If I Could Travel Anywhere Tomorrow

enough.title: My 5-Step Journey to Freedom and Personal Power
enough.about_course: My approach combines a powerful fusion of intuitive and spiritual guidance with a proven, strategic 5-Step plan that can enable you to reclaim your purpose and create a life bigger and better than the one you are trying to leave behind. I’ve been where you are—on the edge of a breakthrough, yet confused and unsure of my next steps. But when I was introduced to the work of Katherine Woodward Thomas and her 5-Step process, I took a leap of faith, and that’s where my transformation began. Working closely with Katherine, I transitioned out of a toxic and unhappy marriage and stepped into my own personal power
